records.addlTxt: 10:53am Defendant Pervis B. Menton in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael Robert Barth in court for Pervis B. Menton.  Attorney Sydney Elizabeth Star in court for State of Wisconsin. Clerk HM.  On stat's motion, cts 2 and 3 are DRI.  DE enters guilty plea to ct 1.  Court finds DE guilty of ct 1.  PSI ordered. Stip to restitution in the amt of $150.  SEH 12/1 1:30pm.   Bond continued.

8:45 AM Defendant Pervis B. Menton in court, in custody.  Attorney Michael Robert Barth in court for Pervis B. Menton.  Attorney Sydney Elizabeth Star in court for State of Wisconsin. Clerk HM.  No resolution. Trial scheduled. DE's motion for bond reduction. DE eligible for Vivitrol program.  State objects. Court hears brief argument. Court denies motion.  Bond continued.  DE would like to plea now.  Court goes off record for discussions.
Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Assistant District Attorney Sydney Star appeared for the State.  Attorney Barth appeared for the DE, who appeared via Zoom in custody. Clerk/S. Garcia. Attorney Barth argues a bond motion and requests a signature bond. ADA Starr would not object with the condition that the DE not miss a single vivitrol appointment and if he did the signature bond would be revoked and cash bond reinstated.  The attorneys also state that an offer has been extended.  The Court will set this for a plea hearing this week and allow Judge Dougvillo to decide the bond motion if needed.  DE to appear in person.
Plea hearing scheduled for September 30, 2022 at 08:30 am.
State and Atty Barth appear for 8/17 hearing. NO record. Atty Barth has not met with DE yet. PTC set over to 9/28 845am.

Defendant Pervis B. Menton in court, in custody.  Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE is eligible for SPD. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time limits for Attorney to be appointed.  DE proceeds pro se today.    ST called witness KPD Ofc Albert Gonzales; sworn in and testified; cross-examination by DE. ST rested and moved for bind over; arguments heard. Probable cause found; bound over for trial. Information filed; reading waived. Not guilty pleas entered by the Court. . Scheduling Order given to the DE in court.   Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 09:00 am.
DE is eligible for SPD services.
